Text.Page: (The centurion's dead hand holds a map of the maze. There's an "X" <font color='#660000'>past the end of the southeast side of the depths</font>, and a note: "Dangerous!")

That's the face that haunts my nightmares: Lamakus!

But the fact that it's not attached anymoreâ€”that belongs in my wildest dreams!

A thousand thanks, . Leaderless gulas are disorganized, and disorganized gulas are no match for us.
